# Rodentia
Rodentia are a race of humanoid beings resembling rodents. They are resourceful, evasive, and sneaky, but that comes at the cost of fragile physicality.
## Diet
- Can eat raw meat. - Will get poisoned by Theobromine (Chocolate, Tea, Coffee) and Allicin (Onion, Garlic).
## Benefits
- Can use their claws to do some [color=red]Slashing[/color] and [color=red]Blunt[/color] damage. - Smaller than humans. - Can fit in duffelbags.
## Special
- Can Rummage in disposal chutes to dig up trash. - Can store small items in their cheeks. Having items in their mouth makes their speech unintelligible, and they will drop all of the items if attacked, stunned, or shoved. - Can "sneak" underneath tables, but not doors.
## Drawbacks
- [color=#ffa500]Takes 30% more Blunt damage, and 15% more Slash and Piercing damage.[/color] - Always triggers mousetraps, regardless of whether or not they are wearing shoes. - Gets hungry 33% faster.
